languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, молю о снисхождении за мою дерзость, но я не могу не вмешаться! Позвольте еще раз напомнить: мы заперты в системе, пока что — без возможности куда-либо транслироваться. Будьте благоразумны — неужели вы хотите своими руками избавиться от торгового партнера? И не забывайте, что Пустотное братство наверняка об этом узнает..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, молю о снисхождении за мою дерзость, но я не могу не вмешаться! Позвольте еще раз напомнить: мы заперты в системе, пока что — без возможности куда-либо транслироваться. Будьте благоразумны — неужели вы хотите своими руками избавиться от торгового партнера? И не забывайте, что Пустотное братство наверняка об этом узнает..."

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, молю о снисхождении за мою дерзость, но я не могу не вмешаться! Позвольте еще раз напомнить: мы заперты в системе, пока что — без возможности куда-либо транслироваться. Будьте благоразумны — неужели вы хотите своими руками избавиться от торгового партнера? И не забывайте, что Пустотное братство наверняка об этом узнает..."

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are locked in the system, without the ability to translocate anywhere else for now. Be reasonable, do you really want to get rid of a trading partner with your own hands? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are locked in the system, without the ability to translocate anywhere else for now. Be reasonable, do you really want to get rid of a trading partner with your own hands? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to warp anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to warp anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, pardonnez mon audace, mais puis-je me permettre de vous rappeler que nous sommes actuellement coincés dans ce système, sans aucun moyen de sauter où que ce soit ? Je vous en conjure, montrez-vous raisonnable. Souhaitez-vous réellement, dans la situation qui est la nôtre, éliminer un partenaire commercial potentiel ? Sans oublier que la Communauté du vide ne manquera pas d'apprendre ce qui s'est passé... »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, pardonnez mon audace, mais puis-je me permettre de vous rappeler que nous sommes actuellement coincés dans ce système, sans aucun moyen de sauter où que ce soit ? Je vous en conjure, montrez-vous raisonnable. Souhaitez-vous réellement, dans la situation qui est la nôtre, éliminer un partenaire commercial potentiel ? Sans oublier que la Communauté du vide ne manquera pas d'apprendre ce qui s'est passé... »

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, verzeiht meine Impertinenz, aber ich darf Euch erneut daran erinnern, dass wir im Moment in diesem System festsitzen und an keinen anderen Ort springen können. Seid vernünftig. Wollt Ihr Euch wirklich ausgerechnet jetzt eines Handelspartners entledigen? Und denkt daran, die Gefährten der Leere werden mit großer Wahrscheinlichkeit erfahren, was hier geschieht ..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, verzeiht meine Impertinenz, aber ich darf Euch erneut daran erinnern, dass wir im Moment in diesem System festsitzen und an keinen anderen Ort springen können. Seid vernünftig. Wollt Ihr Euch wirklich ausgerechnet jetzt eines Handelspartners entledigen? Und denkt daran, die Gefährten der Leere werden mit großer Wahrscheinlichkeit erfahren, was hier geschieht ..."

"Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, verzeiht meine Impertinenz, doch ich darf Euch erneut daran erinnern: Wir sitzen im Moment in diesem System fest und können es nicht per Warpsprung verlassen. Seid vernünftig, wollt Ihr wirklich ausgerechnet jetzt einen Handelspartner loswerden? Und denkt daran, die Gefährten der Leere werden mit großer Wahrscheinlichkeit erfahren, was hier geschieht ..."

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, disculpe mi impertinencia, pero debo recordarle que estamos atrapados en el sistema y no podemos cruzar la disformidad. Sea razonable, ¿de verdad cree que es el mejor momento para deshacerse de un socio comercial? Y recuerde, es muy probable que la Hermandad del Vacío se entere de lo que está a punto de suceder...».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, disculpe mi impertinencia, pero debo recordarle que estamos atrapados en el sistema y no podemos cruzar la disformidad. Sea razonable, ¿de verdad cree que es el mejor momento para deshacerse de un socio comercial? Y recuerde, es muy probable que la Hermandad del Vacío se entere de lo que está a punto de suceder...».

languages.text: “大人，请原谅我的无礼，但请允许我再次提醒您：我们目前被困在这个星系中，无法通过亚空间前往其他区域。请您理智些，您真的想在这种时候放弃贸易伙伴吗？别忘了，接下来发生的事情，很可能会传到虚空协联耳中……”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

traits.locale_text: “大人，请原谅我的无礼，但请允许我再次提醒您：我们目前被困在这个星系中，无法通过亚空间前往其他区域。请您理智些，您真的想在这种时候放弃贸易伙伴吗？别忘了，接下来发生的事情，很可能会传到虚空协联耳中……”

languages.text: 「陛下、無礼をお許しください。しかし、今一度お考え直しください。我々は現在この星系に閉じ込められており、どこにもジャンプできません。冷静にお考えください。よりによって今、本当に貿易相手を排除すべきでしょうか？そして『虚空の仲間』は、これから起こることを知る可能性が非常に高いのですよ…」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、無礼をお許しください。しかし、今一度お考え直しください。我々は現在この星系に閉じ込められており、どこにもジャンプできません。冷静にお考えください。よりによって今、本当に貿易相手を排除すべきでしょうか？そして『虚空の仲間』は、これから起こることを知る可能性が非常に高いのですよ…」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, münasebetsizliğim için beni lütfen affedin ancak izninizle bir kez daha hatırlamam gerek: Şu an sistemde kısılı kaldık ve başka bir yere sıçrama yapabilme kabiliyetimiz yok. Akıllıca davranın. Gerçekten şu anda bir ticaret olanağını yok etmek istiyor musunuz? Unutmayın, Uçsuz Kardeşliği'nin gerçekleşmek üzere olan şeyi öğrenme ihtimali hayli yüksek."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I beg forgiveness for my impertinence, but let me remind you once again: we are currently locked in the system, without the ability to jump anywhere else. Be reasonable, do you really, now of all times, want to get rid of a trading partner? And remember, the Fellowship of the Void is very likely to learn of what is about to transpire..."
